original_title: Nikias Skapinakis: O Teatro Dos Outros
overview: Documentary about the work of the painter Nikias Skapinakis from the exhibition “Imaginary Bedrooms” which in June 2006 opened at the Museum Arpad Scenes-Vieira da Silva. Film by Jorge Silva Melo that closely follows the work of one of the most important painters of the second half of the 20th century, specifically in the area of portrait.
title: Nikias Skapinakis: O Teatro Dos Outros
